modName: Beautiful  Skyrim HD Armour and Shields
summary:
Beautiful  Skyrim HD Armour and Shields
HD Retextures of all the armour and shields in game
Working through the textures one folder at a time.
Please check images section :)
descriptionHtml:
Beautiful  Skyrim HD Armor and Shields
HD Retextures of all the armour and shields in game
Working through the textures one folder at a time.
Please check images section :)

[URL=http://beautifulskyrim.blogspot.com]Visit my Beautiful Skyrim blog[/URL]

Please endorse if you like my textures
checkout my other mods  
[URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=120]Beautiful Skyrim-HD Clutter and Furniture[/URL]
[URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1377]Beautiful Skyrim-HD Weaponry[/URL]

[IMG]http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/2079/glassq.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/9763/armuo.jpg[/IMG]

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder
Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

Deadric ReleaseV0.1
Glass ReleaseV0.1- added transparency to glass pieces (Wip)
